preqs: 12 points from level two BIO or GEN units or by permission

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {BIO2%, GEN2%}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {BIO2%, GEN2%}

description: This unit investigates how plants and animals respond to their environment. The unit covers a range of biomes including oceans, freshwaters and terrestrial ecosystems and considers the major environmental stresses caused by global change in these systems and how the biota acclimate and adapt to such stresses.
